channel.title: [508] need help
channel.description: Ok, i followed a tut on rune-s, i downloaded client, a server, changed jdk thing in all.bat, run.bat, all that stuff, and i downloaded the cache, put it in the C: disk drive, i run server then client, i put "0.0.0.0" in the ip box, then it stops loading the client on 'connecting to update server', please tell me what i am doing wrong.
